entry.title: Dynabrade 53233 - 6 Inch Diameter Type 11 Vertical Cup Wheel Grinder 2 Hp 6000 Rpm Gearless Rotational Exhaust 5/8 11 Inch Spindle Thread
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Angle Grinders
Price: 1754.47

[shortdesc]
  • 6 Inch (152 mm) Dia
  • Type 11 Vertical Cup Wheel Grinder
  • 2 hp, 6,000 RPM, Gearless, Rotational Exhaust, 5/8 Inch-11 Spindle Thread
  • Ideal for heavy-duty applications in foundries and shipyards
  • Fast stock, rust and scale removal.
  • Governor-controlled air motor maintains tool RPM under heavy load
  • Over-speed shut-off feature ensures maximum operator safety
  • Motor is gearless with less wearable parts, ensuring reduced maintenance and less down-time.
  • Insulated tool handle minimizes cold air transmission to the hand
  • Handle position is adjustable for operator comfort
  • Includes safety-lock throttle lever
  • For peak performance, use of optional 95870 Air Hose-1/2 Inch (13 mm) diameter is recommended.
  • Model accepts optional Type 11 Cup Wheels, 6 Inch (152 mm) diameter
  • Wheel NOT included with tool
  • Covers more area in less time!
  • More information here! D12.05R
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Angle Grinders
    RPM 6000
    Spindle Thread 5/8 Inch - 11 Male

Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Die Grinders
Price: 1319.46

[shortdesc]
  • .7 hp Extended Right Angle Die Grinder
  • 12,000 RPM, Steel, Geared, Rear Exhaust, 1/4 Inch & 6 mm Collet
  • Dynabrade's .7 hp Die Grinders are ideal for rapid material removal, deburring, finishing and polishing, in an ergonomic right angle design
  • These top-quality tools accept optional carbide burrs and mounted points, providing countless solutions to manufacturing and fabrication industries, foundries, die shops, welding operations, nuclear facilities, shipyards and more!

entry.title: Dynabrade 56739 - .7 Hp 7 Degree Offset Die Grinder Central Vacuum 18000 Rpm Gearless Rear Exhaust 1/4 Inch & 6 mm Collets Extended Muffler
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Die Grinders
Price: 827.95

[shortdesc]
  • .7 hp 7 Degree Offset Die Grinder, Central Vacuum
  • 18,000 RPM, Gearless, Rear Exhaust, 1/4 Inch & 6 mm Collets, Extended Muffler
  • .7 hp Vacuum Die Grinders for connection to central vacuum systems
  • Achieve rapid material removal with source capture
  • Gearless for less maintenance.
  • .7 hp (522 W) Vacuum Die Grinders are utilized for rapid material removal, precise finishing, polishing, deburring, and removal of parting lines and flash
  • For use with carbide burrs, rotary files, mounted points, roll cartridges, wheels and discs.
  • Model includes urethane Vacuum Shroud for efficient capture of dust, debris, and contaminants such as Hexavalent Chromium
  • For use on non-ferrous materials, such as fiberglass, carbon fiber and composites.
  • Also includes Vacuum Sleeve, which can be easily trimmed to accommodate the length of the accessory
  • Sleeve can be trimmed horizontally or vertically, and is also removable
  • All models includes Conductive Hose & Cuffs, to shield operator from electrostatic discharge (ESD)
  • 1-1/4 Inch Dia
  • Vacuum Hose Port.
  • Each model also includes 6 mm Collet Insert.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Air Flow 34.0

    Height 1-7/8 Inch

entry.title: Dynabrade Dynapen 10832 - Dynapen Reciprocating Tool 3 mm Collet 14000 Rpm .007 Inch Sl In-Line 36 Degree Swivel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Specialty Grinders
Price: 570.37

[shortdesc]
  • DynaPen Reciprocating Tool, 3 mm Collet
  • 14,000 SPM, .007 Inch (.018 mm) SL, In-Line 360 Degree Swivel
  • 14,000 strokes per minute
  • .007 Inch stroke length (.018 mm)
  • precision removal resulting in less risk of gouging delicate parts
  • less aggressive than a Die Grinder
  • Lightweight & Faster than hand-filing.
  • Only one included wrench required
  • easier to change files
  • Easy grip rubber sleeve
  • Includes 3 mm collet insert
  • Accepts 1/16 Inch, 3/32 Inch, 1/8 Inch collet inserts (sold separately).
  • Lubrication is not recommended during operation
  • Lubrication is ONLY recommended during storage.
  • Easy grip rubber sleeve makes it easy to hold tool securely
  • Especially important when using tool for precision removal on delicate parts
  • In-line 360-Degrees Swivel is incorporated into the airline
  • This allows more maneuverability for the operator on contoured parts.
  • In-line filter is included to prevent debris from entering the tool through the airline
  • Scribes and Chisels are made of high carbon steel that is heat-treated and tempered to a hardness of 62 Rockwell.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Line Dynapen
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Specialty Grinders
    RPM 14000
